name: Geordi Taylor
headline: Strategic Leadership at the Intersection of Business & Technical Execution.
bio: Leveraging a decade of domain expertise in global energy markets and sustainability to drive technical transformation in privacy and security architecture. From orchestrating enterprise-wide data privacy frameworks to leading vulnerability management initiatives across mission-critical infrastructure â€” I serve as the strategic bridge between business objectives and technical execution.
narrativeIntro: Privacy Engineering: Orchestrating and scaling data privacy frameworks across complex enterprise ecosystems. I specialize in bridging the gap between legacy infrastructure and modern privacy-by-design principles—ensuring that high-stakes, regulated environments remain both compliant and innovative. My background spans co-founding a clean energy startup, publishing energy policy research, and modernizing fintech platforms. Today, I lead privacy and security transformation for critical infrastructure, simplifying complexity at the intersection of technical architecture and global business strategy.

development.context: Immersive study in Germany focused on global economics and international business.
Professional education in data science libraries (Pandas, NumPy) and backend database management.

languages.context: Advanced professional working proficiency; Minor in French from Pace University.
Native fluency; leveraging deep cultural and linguistic roots to navigate diverse international environments.
Basic conversational proficiency developed during immersion at the University of Mannheim.
